Explore.name: Explore Services
Explore.title: Discover Services Around You
Explore.description: Browse a wide variety of services offered by local professionals. Find exactly what you need with our intuitive search filters.

Post.name: Post Your Work
Post.title: Showcase Your Skills
Post.description: As a service provider, post examples of your work for potential clients to see and appreciate. Attract more business with visually appealing posts.

Share.name: Share Posts Easily
Share.title: Share Services with Others
Share.description: Found a post or service you want to recommend? Share it easily by copying the link. When someone clicks on the link, theyâ€™ll be directed straight to the post or service within the app.

Connect.name: Connect with Providers
Connect.title: Contact Service Providers Easily
Connect.description: Reach out to service providers directly through the app. Discuss details, ask questions, and book their services effortlessly.

Ratings.name: Ratings & Reviews
Ratings.title: Trustworthy Feedback
Ratings.description: Check ratings and read reviews before making decisions. Leave your own feedback after using a service to help others in the community.
